titleStmt.title: A Description of the Academy of the Athenian virtuosi with a discourse held there in vindication of Mr. Dryden's Conquest of Granada against the author of the Censure of the Rota.

notesStmt.note: Probably written by Richard Leigh; a continuation of his The censure of the Rota. Cf. BM; Stonehill, Block & Stonehill; Scott, W. Life of John Dryden.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
